txt.en: 'Would you mind taking this crate over to Irodon? He should be in the centre of town.'
A fresh shipment of building materials has arrived in Halach.
You've delivered the crate to Irodon.\n\nYou should confirm with Gorhir at Halach's harbour.

'Look at all of these crates, [placeholder]! Filled to the brim with building materials, too!\n\n'Would you mind taking this one over to Irodon? He should be supervising rebuilding efforts in the centre of town.'
'You hauled such heavy cargo without even breaking a sweat. Impressive work!'
'Thank you, friend! I expect Gorhir will want to know the materials have been delivered.'
Pick up a heavy crate from the pile
'Thank you, friend! I expect Gorhir will want to know the materials have been delivered.'
Gorhir has asked you to take a crate to Irodon, who is supervising rebuilding efforts in the centre of Halach.\n\nYou can take the crate from the pile next to Gorhir.
